plugin.name: excel-import
plugin.author: Jean Barmash, Oleksiy Symonenko
plugin.title: Excel, Excel 2007 & CSV Importer Using Apache POI
plugin.description: \ Excel-Import plugin uses Apache POI [http://poi.apache.org/] library (v 3.6) to parse Excel files. It's useful for either bootstrapping data, or when you want to allow your users to enter some data using Excel spreadsheets.
